index_function.GUIDE:
𝗩𝙵𝙲𝙵𝙲 - 𝗔𝙸 𝗚𝙿𝚃 𝗖𝙷𝙰𝚃 𝗔𝙸

About V-F-C-F-C - AI Chat AI bot,

This bot is integrated with Barinshop and Open AI chat gpt Module.

Commands of Queen-AI,

❍ .pm-chatbot ➪ With this command you can enable or disable the Brainshop Inbox Chat Bot.

❍ .group-chatbot ➪ This command allows you to enable or disable the Brainshop Group Chat Bot.

❍ .gpt-pm-chatbot ➪ With this command you can enable or disable Gpt Inbox Chat Bot.

❍ .gpt-group-chatbot ➪ With this command you can enable or disable Gpt Group Chat Bot.

❍ .davinci-pm-chatbot ➪ With this command you can enable or disable Gpt Davinci Inbox Chat Bot.

❍ .davinci-group-chatbot ➪ With this command you can enable or disable Gpt Davinci Group Chat Bot.

❍ .botmode ➪ With this command you can run V-F-C-F-C - AI Chat Bot in both Public and Self modes.

❍ .mute-option ➪ This command allows you to mute the V-F-C-F-C - AI bot completely or only mute the bot on a particular chat.

❍ .set-presence ➪ With this command you can enable or disable the appearance of Typing on the bot's responses when the bot is running.

❍ .set-react ➪ With this command you can enable or disable auto-react to all messages.

❍ .power-setting ➪ With this command you can restart or disable the bot.

❍ .information ➪ This command can help you with the bot's source code and the bot project.
index_function.NOTE:
Note...

you can use all commands only in your log chat and type .setting-menu to get the main menu here.
